name: The rush (Daxxboii)
description:
The MC of our game is a renowned thief who plans to steal a some tech from a facility but as it turns out , he is stuck in an interdimensional loop and ends up with many monsters nearby.....

Also, the player discovers his newfound ability to rewind time (Keypress :- Enter)

The theme (Change) comes here into play as the character changes different dimensions regularly
